title: after i pick my champion game will not connect no matter what
body: it goes to the reconnect screen and wont do nothing

replies.body: Hmmm it sounds like your client is having problems only when it's trying to connect to our game servers. This might be caused sometimes if there's something blocking your network, so let's be sure to start troubleshooting there first. Go through and make a few adjustments while following our [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that doesn't seem to help.
